external_references.source_name: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta Toneshell February 2025
external_references.description: Nathaniel Morales, Nick Dai. (2025, February 18). Earth Preta Mixes Legitimate and Malicious Components to Sidestep Detection. Retrieved September 10, 2025.
Nick Dai, Vickie Su, Sunny Lu. (2022, November 18). Earth Preta Spear-Phishing Governments Worldwide. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has checked the process name and process path to ensure it matches the expected one prior to triggering a custom exception handler.(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload) [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has also searched for running antivirus processes to include ESET’s antivirus associated executables ekrn.exe and egui.exe.(Citation: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta Toneshell February 2025)
